## About This Project

This project demonstrates interactive data visualization techniques using modern tools and libraries.

### Goals

- Provide clear examples of interactive visualizations
- Showcase best practices in data visualization
- Offer educational resources for learning data viz

### Technologies Used

- **Quarto**: For creating this website
- **Python**: For data analysis and visualization
- **Matplotlib**: For static visualizations
- **Plotly**: For interactive charts and graphs

### Contributing

This is an open project. Contributions are welcome!

## Contact

For questions or suggestions, please open an issue on the GitHub repository.
